item.title: FT Most Read: Thursday, January 23, 2025 at 3:15 AM UTC

1. Trump tells Putin to reach Ukraine ‘deal’ soon or US will increase sanctions
2. Trump halts more than $300bn in US green infrastructure funding
3. OpenAI spars with Elon Musk over $500bn Stargate project
4. Trump vs the ‘deep state’: president’s vendetta agenda takes shape
5. [Opinion] The strange liberal nonchalance about Trump’s return
